mapper.sql: ID, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, NAME, STATUS, BAK1, BAK2, BAK3, BAK4, BAK5, BAK6
mapper.select: SELECT ID as id,NAME as name FROM FR_MG_ROLE WHERE STATUS='1' and LEVEL=#{level}
mapper.insert: insert into FR_MG_ROLE (ID, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, NAME, STATUS, BAK1, BAK2, BAK3, BAK4, BAK5, BAK6, REMARK) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{bak1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bak2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bak3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bak4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bak5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bak6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=CLOB})

update FR_MG_ROLE
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

BAK5 = #{bak5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BAK6 = #{bak6,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=CLOB},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
